properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Baba Eleda Wa
Gbo orin iyin wa
L'aye ati l'orun
Baba Olubukun

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Iwo l'ogo ati iyin
Ope ati ola ye fun

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Wo Olorun Omo
T'oku lati gba wa
Enit' o ji dide
Ti o si goke lo

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Si O Emi Mimo
Ni a korin iyin
Iwo t'o fimole
Iye si okan wa

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mimo, mimo, mimo
Ni `yin metalokan
La'ye ati l'orun
L'ao ma korin pe;
